description: Try our easy to follow Sweet & Savoury Filled Croissants recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sweet & Savoury Filled Croissants Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Smoked Salmon Croissants Combine chives, lemon juice and cream cheese in a bowl. Season. Halve croissants and spread with cream cheese mixture. Top with salmon and rocket. Sandwich with croissant tops. Serve.

Strawberry & Ricotta Croissants Combine ricotta and 1 1/2 tablespoons icing sugar in a bowl. Halve croissants and spread bases with 1/2 cup jam and ricotta mixture. Arrange over sliced strawberries and sandwich with croissants tops. Dust with remaining icing sugar. Serve.
